name: Paradise Mecha
description:
Your ship has crash landed on a small island some where in the pacific ocean. All systems have been shut down. Nothing works, except for a single mecha. The enemy ship, packed full of mechas and fighter jets, is hot on your trail, and will arrive at any moment, 30 seconds to be exact. As it is, your only course of action is to fight them all off by yourself, while defending your own ship from being destroyed. Quite a lot rests on your shoulders.

Your mecha is equipped with both a sword and blaster cannons. Use them to their full extent by hacking, slashing, and blasting your way through any enemy mechas, and maybe a ship or two (Though hopefully not your own).

You'll eventually have square up, and go head to stern with the enemy ship. But  you won't be able to touch it till you destroy all of its turrets.

So what are you waiting for! Go fight some mechas!

Update notes:

I realized to late I was using the wrong materials for the mechas and ships, so I've reuploaded with the proper colors. Everything else is the same. 

You can still play the original jam version if ya want.
